content.raw:
that sounds reasonable to me, it was the different machines that caused the difference of behaviour.

Monthly docker cache invalidation occurs after the `BASE_DEPENDENCIES` installation: #!/osrf/release-tools/src/15d92a5da840b16c83cf07937a6c7bfd019f1464/jenkins-scripts/docker/lib/docker_generate_dockerfile.bash?at=default&fileviewer=file-view-default#docker_generate_dockerfile.bash-203

I'll try to get ash.intel.xenial to run a build without this patch, but with an invalidated cache instead. This might have side effects for other jobs: still go ahead with it?
